Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~wlahti What's your opinion of what needs to be done here? See the comments in the CR...

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: This seems like an "improvement" request and not a bug. The CLI is not intended to support every possible use case of Fabric. And I agree with Ale's comment that an SDK should be used for this functionality at this point in time.Â
